title: "Fujitsu to provide HPC, AI for startup to produce clean ammonia"
excerpt: "Fujitsu has signed an agreement with Atmonia to deliver HPC and AI technology for the development of catalysts to drive the clean production of ammonia, which is being touted as an alternative to fossil fuels."
